Edit3: WOW even UNINSTALL AND INSTALLING AGAIN DOESNT HELP?! help please!{{item:2050}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: This black screen issue is usually caused by a connection problem, so it can't download assets.  Reinstalling would not really resolve the issue in this case.  Instead, I recommend going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!.
